item.title: University Police Headquarters
item.description:
Entrance located on the northwest corner of the parking garage. Visitor parking (for police business only) available in the garage on the north side.

Address

300 N. 17th St.
Lincoln, NE 68588

Phone

Emergency: 911
UNL Police: 402-472-2222

Website

police.unl.edu

item.title: Lincoln Police Department Headquarters
item.description:
Located in the Justice and Law Enforcement Center at 10th and Lincoln Mall, on the first floor.

Address

575 S. 10th Street
Lincoln, NE 68508

Phone

Emergency: 911
Lincoln Police Telephone Directory

item.dc:subject: police

item.title: Lincoln Police Department Center Team Station
item.description:
Located on the northwest corner of N. 27th Street and Holdrege Streets. The team station is home to the Center Team and serves as an enhanced access point for the community where it is located. This project was undertaken as a greater plan to improve the North 27th Street area.

Address

1501 N. 27th Street
Lincoln, NE 68503

Phone

Emergency: 911
Lincoln Police Telephone Directory

Website

lincoln.ne.gov/city/police/
item.dc:subject: police

item.title: Lincoln Police Department Northeast Team Station
item.description:
The Northeast Team has a new full service police station located at 4843 Huntington in the heart of University Place. The building, Originally constructed as a telephone exchange in the mid 1920's, has been completely remodeled as a functional police station capable of acting as a back up to any existing police facility.

Address

4843 Huntington Ave
Lincoln, NE 68504

Phone

Emergency: 911
Lincoln Police Telephone Directory

Website

lincoln.ne.gov/city/police/
